meanings.definition: A small amount of something that remains after the main part has gone.
meanings.sent1: After the party, there were only a few residuums of cake left.
meanings.sent2: The cleaning crew found residuums of dust in the corners of the room.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel collected the residuums of nuts to save for later.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like residuums, lingering long after the event.
meanings.sent5: The scent of flowers left a pleasant residuums in the air.

meanings.definition: A substance that remains after a process has been completed.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the residuums left in the test tube.
meanings.sent2: The factory disposed of the residuums from the production line.
meanings.sent3: The chef used the residuums of sauce to create a new dish.
meanings.sent4: The old building held the residuums of stories within its walls.
meanings.sent5: The storm left behind residuums of destruction in its wake.
